description: Detects suspicious mshta process execution patterns
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Mshta.EXE Execution Patterns
query: (((((process.executable.text:"*\\mshta.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"MSHTA.EXE")) AND (process.parent.executable.text:("*\\cmd.exe" OR "*\\cscript.exe" OR "*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe" OR "*\\regsvr32.exe" OR "*\\rundll32.exe" OR "*\\wscript.exe") AND process.command_line.text:("*\\AppData\\Local\\*" OR "*C\:\\ProgramData\\*" OR "*C\:\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*")))) OR ((((process.executable.text:"*\\mshta.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"MSHTA.EXE")) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Windows\\System32\\*" OR "C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*.htm*" OR "*.hta*")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*mshta.exe" OR "*mshta")))))))
